body_html: I'd like sparse autograd support as well. It is hard to build custom, non-standard layers without them while wanting to maintain the built-in parallelism and speed of the aforementioned operations. Otherwise, I'd be writing slow, looping Python code, or I would have to use dense tensors which wastes both compute and memory (to the point of intractability), or I'd have to write some sort of extension, which can be a very big pain if I am just trying out new ideas that may not actually work well or at all.
